channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Judge Finds Giuliani in Contempt for Continued Defamation of Election Workers
item.description: In November, Rudy Giuliani repeated accusations against the women at least four times, after Donald J. Trump won the 2024 presidential election.

item.title: 2024’s Record-Breaking Heat Brought the World to a Dangerous Threshold. Now What?
item.description: Global temperatures last year crept past a key goal, raising questions about how much nations can stop the planet from heating up further.

item.title: Kentucky reaches $110 million deal with Kroger to settle its opioid lawsuit—‘This massive grocery chain…allowed the fire of addiction to spread’
item.description: The state will use the settlement money to combat an addiction that has ravaged communities.

item.title: The Fight Over Lee Kuan Yew’s House
item.description: A son of the country’s founding father says he has been persecuted by the government because of a feud with his older brother, who until May was prime...

item.title: S&P 500 Hit in Worst Day Since ‘Post-Fed Tantrum’: Markets Wrap
item.description: A 1.5% slide in the S&P 500 Friday wiped out its advance in the nascent year.

item.title: L.A. Utilities’ Decisions to Keep Power On Are Scrutinized
item.description: Energy experts said the decision by utility companies serving the area not to turn off many power lines during high winds had likely increased the ris...

item.title: The Fight Over Lee Kuan Yew’s House
item.description: A son of the country’s founding father says he has been persecuted by the government because of a feud with his older brother, who until May was prime...

item.title: BlackRock leaves major climate group amid Wall Street exodus
item.description: BlackRock, which oversees more than $11 trillion, has been the subject of attacks from GOP lawmakers for embracing what conservatives call “woke” poli...

item.title: ISIS Says It Inspired New Orleans Attack, but Doesn’t Claim Responsibility
item.description: The attacker who killed 14 pedestrians on Bourbon Street was “influenced by the discourse and messaging of the Islamic State,” the terrorist group sai...

item.title: Sam Moore, Half of Dynamic Soul Duo Sam & Dave, Is Dead at 89
item.description: Mr. Moore and Dave Prater stormed the R&B and pop charts with indelible hits like “Soul Man” and “Hold On, I’m Comin’.”

item.title: LA inferno could inflict a $150 billion economic wound, with a grueling 10-year recovery ahead
item.description: Higher material and labor costs as well as increased demand for contractors could slow the process, expert says.

item.title: Mauro Morandi, Italy’s Robinson Crusoe, Dies at 85
item.description: He was the sole resident of Budelli, an undeveloped sliver of paradise off the northern coast of Sardinia. He embraced the solitude, until he was evic...

item.title: James Arthur Ray, 67, Self-Help Guide Whose Retreat Became Deadly, Dies
item.description: A rising star among New Age motivational speakers, he was brought down by a disaster during one of his retreats in Arizona, where three people died in...

item.title: Medicare and telehealth: more restrictive rules could hit patients in 2025
item.description: Medicare coverage for telehealth and hospital at home was extended for just three months—through March 2025.

item.title: Biden Issues Sweeping Deportation Protections Before Trump Takes Office
item.description: The move allows hundreds of thousands of people from Sudan, Ukraine, El Salvador and Venezuela to stay in the country temporarily.
